Package edu.ncsu.csc216.stp.model.util

Interface ISwapList<E>

Type Parameters:
E - type for the ISwapList
All Known Implementing Classes:
SwapList
public interface ISwapList<E>
Interface for a list that changes the position of elements through swap operations.
Author:
Dr. Sarah Heckman (sarah_heckman@ncsu.edu)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(E element)
    Adds the element to the end of the list.
    E
    get(int idx)
    Returns the element at the given index.
    void
    moveDown(int idx)
    Moves the element at the given index to index+1.
    void
    moveToBack(int idx)
    Moves the element at the given index to size-1.
    void
    moveToFront(int idx)
    Moves the element at the given index to index 0.
    void
    moveUp(int idx)
    Moves the element at the given index to index-1.
    E

    Returns the element from the given index.

    Returns the number of elements in the list.

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(E element)
      Adds the element to the end of the list.
      Parameters:
      element - element to add
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if element is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if element cannot be added

    • remove

      E remove(int idx)
      Returns the element from the given index. The element is removed from the list.
      Parameters:
      idx - index to remove element from
      Returns:
      element at given index
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the idx is out of bounds for the list

    • moveUp

      void moveUp(int idx)
      Moves the element at the given index to index-1. If the element is already at the front of the list, the list is not changed.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of element to move up
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the idx is out of bounds for the list

    • moveDown

      void moveDown(int idx)
      Moves the element at the given index to index+1. If the element is already at the end of the list, the list is not changed.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of element to move down
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the idx is out of bounds for the list

    • moveToFront

      void moveToFront(int idx)
      Moves the element at the given index to index 0. If the element is already at the front of the list, the list is not changed.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of element to move to the front
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the idx is out of bounds for the list

    • moveToBack

      void moveToBack(int idx)
      Moves the element at the given index to size-1. If the element is already at the end of the list, the list is not changed.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of element to move to the back
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the idx is out of bounds for the list

    • get

      E get(int idx)
      Returns the element at the given index.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of the element to retrieve
      Returns:
      element at the given index
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the idx is out of bounds for the list

    • size

      int size()
      Returns the number of elements in the list.
      Returns:
      number of elements in the list
